DOC.brief_title: Cold Pressor Test Used This Study Assess Effect PF-06305591 Pain Intensity Evoked Cold Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 35 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . Subjects unable tolerate prestudy Cpressor test screen . Subjects average pain ( AUC 0 120 sec ) prestudy Cpressor test less equal 20 . Broken skin hand forearm
